directions: Pour the seawater into a shallow, wide container.
Place the container in direct sunlight.
Allow the seawater to evaporate naturally under the sun for about 10 days.
During the evaporation process, periodically stir the water to prevent any crystallization from settling at the bottom.
Once the water has completely evaporated, you will be left with sea salt crystals.
Carefully scrape the sea salt crystals off the container, and store them in an airtight container for future use.
